EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q216.Reminder - Boston
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Boston.
Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow—Boston Wednesday, June 15th, 2016 8:30am – 9:30am Breakfast 9:30am – 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm – 1:00pm Lunch 1:00pm – 3:30pm Sessions Roadshow Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/boston?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pivotal-roadshow-2016-Boston]]>
Location Pivotal Boston <[[http://pivotal.io/locations/boston]]> 145 Broadway, 3rd Floor Cambridge, MA 02142 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/145+Broadway,+Cambridge,+MA+02142/@42.3649281,-71.0910598,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x89e370ae56c77775:0x6f67dbaf689fcdac!8m2!3d42.3649281!4d-71.0888711]]>
Questions? Contact Patrick Gillis at pgillis@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pgillis@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you!
The Pivotal Team
